name: Genevol-usp.GitHub.io
tagline: Site for the USP group of Evolutionary Genetics
body:
### Welcome to the Genevol Pages.

This is the page for the evolutionary genetics group at the University of SÃ£o Paulo

### Our research

Our groups focuses on
 - Human Populations Genetics
 - Evolutionary Genetics of MHC genes
 - Detection of balancing selection in the human genome
 - Selection-driven genetic load
 - HLA transcriptomics


### Authors and Contributors
The lab PI is Diogo Meyer (@diogomeyer).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
